Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Neutrophil antibiotic peptide NP-3 (RatNP-3a, RatNP-3b; Rodents, mammals, animals)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacterium:Staphylococcus aureus 502A;Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli ML-35.Fungi:Candida albicans 820, Cryptococcus neoformans A-383.
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Comments: Active in vitro against S. aureus, fungi, Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria and to a lesser extent against an enveloped virus.

Literature.Title: Purification and antimicrobial properties of three defensins from rat neutrophils.
